attributes.action: Cull the population of Humans on  the Earth by three billion
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are so eager to cull : Seals, Deer, Rabbits, Kangaroos.. etc,etc.. 
Because of their destruction of the environment!
Why not cull Humans?
Are we not destroying resourses far greater than any other animal?
Are we not breeding at a rate far greater than any living thing?
I am not being racist , we have a lot of British Whites who I would get rid of in an instant!
It should be done in a socio-economic, useful scale of practicality.
Each person could be graded by usefulness points.
No politician would  accept this,though, as he or she would be the first against the wall!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
